title: Limbo

replies.body:
So say you join Nebula01
You crash and rejoin.
it automatically puts you into the same game but in chat it says you join. You can't see what players say and your name is white in tab. You get killed and you spawn there because you don't have a respawn location so it spawns you in the overworld.

replies.body: it was in a nebula match. everyone suddenly timed out or something, when i rejoined i was on no ones team, died then got sent here. No one else was there.
